Popular streaming platform Twitch has plans to launch a beta version of a
premium subscription service that will grant users access to new and exclusive
features. The new subscription tiers will cost more while offering new emotes
and custom options for passionate viewers.

_TrustedReviews_ has compiled all the details regarding Twitch Premium you
need to know, including all the costs and rewards that come with being a
member.

## What is Twitch Premium?  

At the moment, viewers can choose to subscribe to their favourite streamers
and content creators with a $4.99 monthly subscription. More often than not
this can come with special emotes, events and Q&A time with their favourite
internet personalities. Twitch Premium aims to make this experience even
bigger and better for those willing to make the investment.

![twitch](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Over the next several weeks subscription options will roll out for beta users.
Costing $9.99 and $24.99 respectively, each tier is designed to represent a
specific number of subscriber counts. $9.99 is worth two and $24.99 is worth a
hefty six.

“As we build this program, our goal is to provide partnered streamers with a
better way to earn a steady income and to give viewers more options to support
streamers on Twitch,” the company said in its official
[FAQ](https://blog.twitch.tv/subscriptionsbeta-4f7535749f2c).

Another feature rolling out with Twitch Premium is the ability to gift
subscriptions to friends. Twitch has said it is working on the introducing the
idea in “the next few months.”

Twitch Premium appears to be a way for partnered streamers to receive a solid
income while simultaneously rewarding active users with unique benefits for
watching on a regular basis.
